Key Match Events: Dion Myers scored 65 not out off 49 balls
Washington Sundar took 3 wickets for 15 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: India took a series lead over Zimbabwe with a 23-run win
Zimbabwe were poor in the field, conceding extra runs and grassing regulation catches
The fourth T20 of the five-match series will be staged on Saturday, July 13
Others: Avesh Khan took 2 wickets for 39 runs
Sikandar Raza took 2 wickets for 24 runs
Blessing Muzarabani took 2 wickets for 25 runs
